mapper.select: SELECT (@i:=@i+1) as serial_no, user_information.*,company.COMPANY_NAME FROM (SELECT @i:=0) AS it, user_information LEFT JOIN company ON user_information.COMPANY_ID = company.COMPANY_ID WHERE AUTHORIZED_FLAG != '2' ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_information LEFT JOIN company ON user_information.company_id = company.company_id WHERE telephone=#{telephone}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_information(telephone, wechat_name, user_name, company_id, mail, authorized_flag) VALUES(#{telephone}, #{wechatName}, #{userName}, #{companyId}, #{mail}, #{authorizedFlag})
